content: base of shell working to center of piece 3 times see photo for aid with placement of chs single_crochet and the following 2dctog photo is from skull-in-tine pattern ch2 2dctog next to base of the next shell we will now finish working the second skull ch3 skip chain space skip hidden st 2dctog in next st ch1 skip st double_crochet in next st twice ch1 skip st 2dctog in next st ch2 skip next shell space skip next chain space skip next 2 sts skip next chain space single_crochet in next shell space border round ch1 slip_stitch into next chain space ch1 2sc ch3 single_crochet in same space 2sc ch3 single_crochet in each of the next 43 chain sps 2sc in next chain space ch4 single_crochet in top of last st made single_crochet in next chain space 2sc ch3 single_crochet in each of the next 3 chain sps join with a slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet fasten_off tuck in any tails block if needed https //www facebook com/wanamakerart/ ref=bookmarks https //www etsy
